title: HTML+CSS Level 4 — Tables
concept: Create simple tables for structured data.

challenges.title: Q1: Student Marks Table
challenges.description: Create a table showing 3 students and marks in 3 subjects. Use a header row for column titles: Name, Subject 1, Subject 2, Subject 3.
challenges.outputDescription: A basic table with header row and data rows.
challenges.starterCode:

<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Marks Table</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Build your marks table here -->
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Q2: Timetable Table
challenges.description: Create a weekly timetable table with days as columns (Mon–Fri) and time slots as rows (at least 4). Fill in subject names in each cell.
challenges.outputDescription: A timetable-like table with headers and content.
examples: First row: empty corner + Mon + Tue + ... as <th> cells.
